CustomField.description: If this is selected, the investor payment's Principal is included in calculating the service fees for the platform. If this is not selected the service fees is not calculated on the Principal component investor payment. If you are selecting this option, do not select 'Collect Serv Fee On Principal Remaining' to avoid over charging the investor.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this is selected, the investor payment's Principal is included in calculating the service fees for the platform. If this is not selected the service fees is not calculated on the Principal component investor payment
CustomField.label: Collect Service Fees on Principal
